name: MoonBit Compiler
description: Installs the MoonBit programming language compiler

moonVersion.description: Pin moon version (e.g., '0.1.0'). Empty means latest.

mooncVersion.description: Pin moonc version (e.g., '0.1.0'). Empty means latest.

moonrunVersion.description: Pin moonrun version (e.g., '0.1.0'). Empty means latest.
